Ut wisi enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exerci tation ullamcorper suscipit lobortis nisl ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. usage:
<img onLoad="shiftzoom.add(this,{showcoords:true,zoom:100});" ...>

 pan left     pan left (fast)     pan left (slow) 
 pan right     pan right (fast)     pan right (slow) 
 pan up     pan up (fast)     pan up (slow) 
 pan down     pan down (fast)     pan down (slow) 
 zoom in*     zoom in (fast)     zoom in 
 zoom out*     zoom out (fast)     zoom out 
* not supported by Firefox and Opera (gecko/presto)

 zoom in     zoom in     zoom in* 
 zoom out     zoom out     zoom out* 
* must be set through preferences by Firefox and Opera (gecko/presto)
